document.full_text: the government said on monday it will proceed to blow up a levee on the mississippi river to relieve flood pressure on other levees along the critical commercial navigation route and save the historic town of cairo, illinois.
document.title: u.s. will blow up levee to save illinois town
lines_and_colors: the government said on monday it will proceed to blow up a levee on the mississippi river to relieve flood pressure on other levees along the critical commercial navigation route and save the historic town of cairo, illinois.
